statements: DELETE FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Legal' AND upload_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_id IN (SELECT document_id FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_name LIKE '%contract%')
DELETE FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND action = 'DELETE';
DELETE FROM regulatory_documents WHERE id = 2 AND uploaded_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'Delete' AND action_date < NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY;
DELETE FROM compliance_issues WHERE resolved = TRUE AND reported_date < '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM audit_trail WHERE performed_by = 'John Doe' AND performed_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM compliance_record WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND compliance_date < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM compliance_documentation WHERE document_type = 'Standard Operating Procedure';
DELETE FROM user_info WHERE user_role = 'Admin' AND department = 'HR';
